DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether dietary inducer glyoxalase 1 effective improve metabolic vascular health .
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study evaluate dietary inducer glyoxalase 1 effect metabolic vascular health overweight volunteer risk develop type 2 diabetes . The research objective : ( ) To evaluate dietary inducer glyoxalase 1 effect marker glucose metabolism oral glucose tolerance test ( oGTT ) , ( ii ) To evaluate dietary inducer glyoxalase 1 effect vascular function three level , use finger fold capillary density capillaroscopy ( FFCD ) , arterial stiffness aortal pulse wave velocity ( aPWV ) flow mediate dilatation ( FMD ) ; effect metabolic pro-inflammatory marker circulate blood urine .
DOC.criteria: BMI 25 40 kg/m2 ( > 23 kg/m2 Asians ) , normal , impaired fasting impaired postprandial glucose . No relevant morbidity . Women preferably postmenopausal . Severe hypertriglyceridemia . Uncontrolled hypertension , cardiovascular disease , relevant renal hepatic disease , diabetes , relevant morbidity . Excess alcohol consumption , smoking , acute pharmacological treatment drug affect glucose metabolism steroid antibiotic . Anticoagulants . Intake herbal remedy . Food allergy .
